title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating checkboxes should use busy cursor. It takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table. A busy cursor should be shown.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table, it takes a long time (30 seconds in my case). No busy cursor is shown during this process.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. In a workspace with many projects, go to Export Zip. 2. Select all projects. 3. Choose file types and select some. 4. Press OK.
